sourcesContent:
const Card = (props) =>{ const discountPercent = 0; const isThereSale = (props.discountPercent > 0) ? props.saleTitle = "Sale" : props.saleTitle = "" const productImageSource = "https://dummyimage.com/450x300/dee2e6/6c757d.jpg" const productTitle = "Product" const originalPrice = 0 const discountPrice = 0 if(discountPercent > 0){ props.saleTitle = "Sale" discountPrice = originalPrice - (originalPrice * discountPercent) } return(
{props.saleTitle}
{props.productTitle}
{props.originalPrice} $18.00
Add to cart
); }; export default Card;
